title: Newly renovated studio apartment $1150/ mo
posting_body: ['Newly renovated studio apartment on the 26th floor, 481 sq ft, has no shared walls with neighbors, available immediately.', '$1,150 /mo.', 'This unit is energy efficient and in a convenient skyway connected quiet building just two blocks from the light rail, the Armory, Finnegan’s Brewery and a short walk away from US Bank Stadium and the Stone Arch Bridge.', 'Enjoy the convenience and excitement of downtown living while having the peace and comfort of your high-rise apartment with north-facing views.', 'Unit is located near elevator bay and has free shared laundry just down the hall.', 'Unit includes a refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave, new kitchen cabinets, new oven and stovetop, large renovated bathroom with new vanity and fixtures, built-in closets for optimal storage, and central air.', ' Space has been thoughtfully designed for downtown studio living.', 'Building amenities include:', '-Free shared laundry', '-Workout room', '-Roof terrace with grills (currently under construction)', '-Restricted FOB-access', '-Multi-layered security', '-24-hour guard and package acceptance on the ground floor', '-Discounted attached parking available', '-Water and trash is included', '-One cat allowed ($25 /month pet rent)', '-No smoking and no dogs allowed', 'Unit is located in City Heights Condos; not Centre Village.', 'There is no pool or spa.', 'Applicants are required to complete a rental application and authorize a $75 credit and background check.', 'Please email with any questions.']
